summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1134, for the improvement of Twenty-seventh Avenue South, from Charles Street to Judkins Street; Elmwood Place from Twenty-seventh Avenue South to Bradner Place, Bradner Place, from Elmwood Place to Judkins Street, and Judkins Street, from Twenty-fourth Avenue South to Twenty-ninth Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 12901 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
